visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes the monthly average temperature data for a year. The series uses a custom color '#FF6347'. Additional configurations include setting the chart type to spline, defining the chart's background color and margins, and specifying the legend's hidden item style to be green.
